title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine pasta with bacon and egg mixture.
Serve with extra parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Prepare sauce with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Mix chicken into sauce and serve with rice.
